title: Advanced version of Gemini with Deep Think officially achieves gold-medal standard at the International Mathematical Olympiad
summary: Our advanced model officially achieved a gold-medal level performance on problems from the International Mathematical Olympiad (IMO), the world’s most prestigious competition for young mathematicians. It earned a total of 35 points by perfectly solving five out of the six problems.
content: Our advanced model officially achieved a gold-medal level performance on problems from the International Mathematical Olympiad (IMO), the world’s most prestigious competition for young mathematicians. It earned a total of 35 points by perfectly solving five out of the six problems.
